name: Lake Reed
description: If you like to support me and my work buy me a kofi!
full_text: If you like to support me and my work buy me a kofi! The Lake Reed is a warm cozy hat with a folded brim. the separation between the cable pattern with purl and ktbl is closed and let less wind through. Size 20cm (8’’) high / 40cm (15.74’’) circumference gauge with needlesize 4mm in 1x1ribbing: 26sts/34rows If you find an error please write me a pm. The Lake Reed is a warm hat with fold-over cuffs. The separation of the cable pattern is tight thanks to left and right interlaced stitches and only lets a little wind through. Size: 20cm high and 40cm circumference Stitch sample: with 4mm in the cuff pattern: 26M/34R If you find an error in the instructions, I would be happy to receive a PM.
